title: Help
body:
When I click launch In the LoL Patcher it turns grey for a second then goes back to orange 
Please if you know how i can fix this please tell me because i can't play League with my friends anymore.

replies.body: The thing is I keep installing it reinstalling it and how do I check if it's a permissions setting blocking the client from loading?

The reappearing launch button could happen for a few reasons like a permissions setting blocking the client from loading, or even a bad install of the update.  Start out with our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that your settings are allowing the client to open.  Let me know if the issue persists, and we'll go from there.
